direction.raw_text: be found in any of the victim's homes? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 120   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : Some police look through Rebecca's room, her closet. They check a label and hold up some items of clothes they've been looking for. CLOSE UP: they open a box and find the Paris Hilton nude photos from the safe. CUT TO: 121   INT. REBECCA'S DAD'S HOUSE LAS VEGAS - DAY                  121 The police enter the living room with the found items and address the detective.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We've located a jacket and jeans that match the description by Lohan, and personal photographs of Paris Hilton. Rebecca's face goes white, and she loses her composure.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If I tell you where everything is, would you let me go? Hypothetically let's say I may know where this property is located and who has it, how could that help me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The detectives on this case are trying to recover hundreds of thousands of dollars worth of property for the victims and I'm sure they would say if your cooperation helped them locate it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I want to help you out, but I don't want to do anything without talking to my attorney. As the police continue to search, a box is open on the coffee table with pot and a pipe. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 121    CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is this your marijuana?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, I have a prescription for it and bought it in California. The police pack it up with other evidence.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're being arrested for stolen property and L.A.P.D. detectives will be filing charges in their jurisdiction for burglary. They handcuff her and escort her out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 122    INT. POLICE STATION - DAY                                  122 Rebecca is being questioned by the L.A. Detective in a small room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you speak to any of the victims?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've spoken to all of the Victims. Rebecca's eyes light up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Really?! What did Lindsay say?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : MUG SHOTS: Flashes pop and we cut to each mug shot: Rebecca, Marc, Nicki, Chloe, Rob. CUT TO: 122A   TMZ FOOTAGE ON T.V.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We see Facebook party photos of Rebecca and the others. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rebecca Ahn, thought to be the ringleader was arrested, and awaits her hearing with the other members. Stay tuned for the latest on the Bling Ring. 123   EXT. POLICE STATION - NIGHT                              123 Paparazzi and video cameras surround Nicki and her sisters as they rush to get in their car. Harsh video camera lights shine in their faces in the darkness.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How do you think you'll do in jail? She keeps moving, with her hood up and sunglasses on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh my god!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is crazy. Laurie drives them away in her black S.U.V.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 124   INTERNET VIDEO CLIP:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A low-res video camera shows Lindsay Lohan get out of a big S.U.V and approach a courthouse in a tight white dress and big sunglasses as she passes a row of photographers. She looks like she's at a premier. Title: Actress Lindsay Lohan arrives at an LA court house after being charged with felony grand theft over a necklace.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 125   INT. NICKI AND SAM'S BEDROOM - DAY                       125 Nicki is trying on court looks for Sam. She has on a Peter- Pan collared shirt, mini skirt and heels, with her hair up in a bun, she turns from the mirror to Sam.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Does this look conservative, is this good? (CONTINUED) Revised Blue - 03/16/12              80. 125   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you like a secretary-style hooker.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shut Up.                                                * She changes her skirt to a little bit longer one.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How about this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's better...you need lower heels.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, Yeah, where are my kitten heels...bitch, you're so fucking lucky you weren't on that video...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know, that sucks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nicki!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 126   INT. NICKI'S HOUSE- DAY                                    126 Laurie calls up to Nicki, the Yorkie barks at the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nicki! Kate from Vanity Fair is here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 127   INT. NICKI'S LIVING ROOM - DAY                             127 Laurie sits next to Nicki as she speaks to KATE, a polished journalist from N.Y. A tape recorder sits in front of Nicki. Nicki's two lawyers, SHANNON a brunette in her early 40's, in a suit and pearls and ADAM, middle-aged lawyer-type, sit with them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do your parents do? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 127   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My mom does a lot of things, she's a minister, she's been a masseuse, she's an energy healer...My dad is a director of photography on T.V. shows, he's been in the industry forever....
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And how is Sam related?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We've adopted her, we met in ballet class when we were little.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was friends with her mother--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mom, this is my interview. I met her when my parents divorced. Now she lives with us, my mom's home schooled us all for a while.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The philosophy of `The Secret', it's based on the law of attraction, but my great- grandmother and grandmother both studied this philosophy. It's man's relationship to the Divine, that's what energy science means.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Since I was young I learned about every religion.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So, Sam was in your ballet class, did she have parents?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She had a dysfunctional background, we both did...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And I met her mom--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can I talk please?! The reason we related so well is my dad is a recovering alcoholic and Sam's mom is.. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 127   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A practicing...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A practicing drug addict and alcoholic and our moms became best friends and...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And then she went off the deep end, she was on the verge--
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Please! I told you that if you're going to be here you had to be quiet! That's why I didn't want you here because you talk!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So, basically you took her in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, we took her in about 6 years ago.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But let's get back to Nicki.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So Adam here told me you do charity work.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, we do a lot of stuff through our church, it's Agape Church.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's the religious science philosophy being taught at Agape Church.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My other sister, Gabby is on a trip with them now helping build homes. And they do a yearly trip to Africa where they build wells and schools for kids.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Which country? (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 127   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Uh, I can't remember exactly which country... We do bake sales and feeding the homeless, that kind of stuff.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ok, so it's a little bit of a disconnect with these positive pursuits and what's happening now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nicki, I don't want you to answer that comment.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think that I'm a firm... I have a good statement to say.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She can speak generally.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not gonna speak about the case, what I was going to say is that I'm a firm believer in karma and I think this situation was attracted into my life as a huge learning lesson for me to grow and expand as a spiritual human being. Nicki is getting emotional as she speaks, her voice quivers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't think the universe chose a better person than me because from this it's not just affecting me, it's affecting the media and everyone and I think I'm meant to bring truth to all this....I believe that I am an old soul.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, she is.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We have gotten to know Nicki and her family and we feel Nicki is an extremely focused, honest person who has a lot to provide to the community. (MORE) (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 127   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And we agree that there hasn't been a disconnect, that there were circumstances that happened but Nicki herself continued to stay on her plane despite the tumultuous experiences happening.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's your goal or life plan if you have one?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I do, I think my journey is to be a leader and push for peace and for the health of our planet-- Nicki starts to get teary eyed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nicki has expressed to me a lot of her humanitarianism.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's my main goal. God didn't give me these talents and what I look like to sit around and just be a model or famous. I want to do something people notice, that's why I'm studying business, so I can be a leader and take a stand for people.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 128   INT. LAWYER'S OFFICE - DAY                                  128 Over Kate's shoulder, we see Marc speaking into her tape recorder, with his lawyer at his side.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I met Rebecca in school after I moved back and went to Indian Hills, I went there because I had a lot of absences. I didn't want to go to school, I had a lot of self- loathing and anxiety issues, I felt that I was ugly...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're not ugly. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 128    CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know I'm not ugly, but I never thought I was an A-list looking guy.I Went to Indian Hills to learn and be with my peers, I felt so self-conscious I didn't look as good as everyone else.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And now you're a star. Marc laughs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: On my Facebook page recently I had
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: friends requests, I accepted them all, I didn't even look at them, then I noticed someone had created a fan page for me. If it had been for something I had done to help the community or benefit something I'd love it, but it's just kind of awkward for me that these people are loving me for something that's looked down on in society... It's kinda showing that America has some sick fascination with a Bonnie and Clyde kind of thing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 128A   FOOTAGE ON TV                                              128A ON T.V. / Headline: Hollywood's "Burglar Bunch" allegedly targeted A-list stars.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: After months of break-ins to the Hollywood homes of celebrities including Lindsay Lohan and Paris Hilton, police say they have finally cracked the case. Could a group of Tinsel Town teens be behind a multi-million dollar heist? Mike Van Freen has the details. We see a montage of the kids, and the victim's homes and celebrities on the red carpet. (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 128   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Could these teenagers be at the center of a celebrity crime spree? Police say they have stolen millions in cash, art and jewelry from the mansions of Orlando Bloom, Lindsay Lohan, Paris Hilton and countless other stars.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 129   EXT. COURT PARKING LOT - DAY                                129 It's a sunny L.A. day. Laurie, Nicki, Sam and Emily get out of their black S.U.V. dressed for court.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can I have a 5 mg adderal. Laurie hands her a pill from her purse, as they stop to do a quick prayer on their way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just remember what we went over with Shannon, they can't prove you were in any of those houses.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know, mom. Laurie smooths her skirt, as she stands straight in high heels. They take hands and bow their heads.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know right here and right now there is one mind, one power and one presence.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mom, shouldn't we go?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stop!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stop what?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stop talking. (CONTINUED) Revised Blue - 03/16/12              87. 129   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She's praying.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know I'm always protected and karma cleanses my journey. Thank you Lord, so much for this truth. And so it is.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And so it is.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... You rock girl!                                    * She hugs her and they break like a football team, and head to court.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 130   EXT. COURTHOUSE - DAY                                    130 Nicki, dressed as a sexy school girl walks up with her mother and sisters. Her lawyer, Shannon, is dressed for success. They are flanked by paparazzi and video camera crews. Nicki stops to make a statement. Shannon stands by her side, getting in the shot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is a very difficult time for myself and my family. Thank you for respecting my privacy, I look forward to my day in court. She does a flirtatious eye roll and saunters past the cameras in her kitten heels.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : We see Chloe enter the courthouse with sunglasses on, flanked by lawyers surrounded by paparazzi and video crews. She keeps her chin up defiantly and makes her way in. CUT TO: Marc walks in with dark sunglasses, wearing a suit, surrounded by camera men. They shout his name to get a shot. (CONTINUED) 88. 130   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How does it feel to be a rat? Marc keeps walking, lawyers by his side, music takes over the sound and it becomes slow motion. Flashes go off and he makes his way through the mayhem.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 131   INT. COURTHOUSE - DAY                                       131 We see Marc, Chloe, Nicki and Rob sitting in a row, dressed for court. CUT TO: 132   INT. COURTHOUSE HALL - DAY                                  132 Rebecca, dressed for court, walks with her mother, who's hair is pulled back severely. She's dressed in a dark suit and tinted glasses. They are flanked by lawyers. She speaks coldly to her in Korean, Rebecca answers her in English.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sit up straight, and speak up when you answer questions.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ok.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What were you thinking? While I was working to support you and your sister. I gave you every thing... You've never done anything right.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : 133   INT. COURTHOUSE - DAY                                       133 Rebecca enters with her mom and lawyers and is brought to a row of seats with Marc, Nicki, Chloe and Rob. She is seated next to Marc, but doesn't look at him. Marc looks over at her, but she stares ahead. The court room door closes. BAM- we hear the sound of a gavel banging over black. (CONTINUED) Revised Blue - 03/16/12                 89. 133   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nicolette Moore, you are found guilty on one count                                     * of first degree residential burglary.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : The court room door flies open and Rebecca, Marc, Chloe, Nicki and Rob are descended on by the press.                      *
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Marc Hall, you are found guilty on                      * 4 counts of first degree                                * residential burglary.                                   * Flashes and coverage continues as they leave. Nicki sobs, we freeze frame on her through a paparazzi's long lens for a few frames and then continue. A distressed Laurie follows like a protective Lioness. Marc looks in shock and keeps his head low, and Rebecca looks pissed as they are led out. We see news cameras descending on them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Marc Hall, you are found guilty, with a charge of 6 counts of residential burglary. You are sentenced to 4 years in state prison and restitution of $800,000. News coverage takes over from the voice of the Judge. 134   EXT. COURTHOUSE - DAY                                       134 From the view of a TMZ-style low-res video camera: They leave the courthouse in the mayhem. We see Nicki, Marc and Rebecca trying to get out with press and lawyers surrounding. Nicki cries, Laurie's freaking out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rebecca Ahn and Marc Hall were both sentenced to 4 years in state prison. Chloe Taynor and Robert Hernandez were each sentenced to a year. We watch them leave as we hear the voice of another reporter.     * (CONTINUED) Revised Blue - 03/16/12            89A. 134   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Members of the Bling Ring were                     * sentenced today for their roles in                 * the rash of break-ins that netted                  * more than three million in high-end                * goods. Rebecca Ahn and Marc Hall                   * were both sentenced with four years                * in state prison, Chloe Taynor and                  * Robert Hernandez will face one year                * each, and Nicolette Moore was                      * sentenced to six months in county                  * jail.                                              *
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 90. 135   EXT. LOS ANGELES POLICE STATION - DAY                       135 It's a sunny afternoon. We see Marc handcuffed to criminals being led onto a white bus that reads: County of Los Angeles Sheriff's department. 136   INT. PRISON BUS - DAY                                       136 Marc sits next to a big, hard-looking criminal. CLOSE ON Marc's face as he looks out the window, while the bus pulls away. Light streams in on his pale face. He looks out as the Los Angeles streets go by. Cut back to Marc's young face looking out the window, music starts, and the bus drives out of frame.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nicki, in full hair and make-up sits in front of a draped curtain back drop talking to an E journalist.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're here with Nicki Moore, who just served 30 days for her involvement in the Bling Ring, and shared a cell block with one of the victims- Lindsay Lohan. There were reports that Lindsay was crying, with you being next to her, did you actually hear any of this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I could hear her crying the first day, which is hard when you're trying to be strong, I just tried to really keep to myself..., I just tried to get through the day , the days are so long you're woken up at
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And how'd she look?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She got to keep her extensions in, most girls were talking about oh- I had to take my weave out...she was in orange like all of us... (CONTINUED)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . 137   CONTINUED:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Were you nervous you were next to her because you were accused of being a part of that group that allegedly robbed her house.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, it was hard for me there were tabloids and on T.V.s in there people were watching the story and they were showing the surveillance video and stuff... and little do people know that when that video came out I was actually in contact with her manager to tell her who I believed the people were who robbed her house... and eventually when I'm able to tell my story people will know the truth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So that's nerve wracking she could think you robbed her house.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She could've, but you know...yeah...Anyway, you can follow everything about me and my journey at Nickimooreforever dot com.
direction.name: direction
